name: Challenge Failed: Saving Christmas!
description:
Can you save Christmas? Santa is sleeping, the elves are missing, and the children won't get any presents! Use you wits and skill in this escape room / investigation style game. Please wishlist the game on Steam to help the game grow.


This is a demo of Challenge Failed in which you can attempt to save Christmas! If you need a hint in the game, press "H"! 

Full version of the game has 3 more challenges:

  • Surviving a Zombie Horde
  • Robbing a Bank
  • Defeating a Dungeon Demon 

This demo version is single player only on Windows PC. However the full release on  Steam will also include multiplayer co-op in which you can complete challenges with your friends. 

The full release will also include a building system on Steam  in which you can build your own challenge / escape room, and have others on steam play your creation!  

Hope you have fun. If you wish to provide feedback, please join our reddit community.
